title: Ex-Vatican treasurer Pell appeals to Australia's High Court to overturn sex offence convictions
text:
Ex-Vatican treasurer Pell appeals to Australia's High Court to overturn sex offence convictions

Global 2 hours ago (Sep 17, 2019 16:00)

Ex-Vatican treasurer Pell appeals to Australia's High Court to overturn sex offence convictions MELBOURNE, Sept 17 (Reuters) - Lawyers for ex-Vatican treasurer Cardinal George Pell on Tuesday filed an appeal to Australia's High Court in a final bid to overturn his conviction for sexually abusing two 13-year-old choir boys, the High Court said. Pell is seeking leave to appeal the state of Victoria's Court of Appeal ruling which upheld his conviction on five charges of abusing two boys at St Patrick's Cathedral in the late 1990s when he was archbishop of Melbourne.

Ex-Vatican treasurer Pell appeals to Australia's High Court to overturn sex offence convictions
description: Ex-Vatican treasurer Pell appeals to Australia's High Court to overturn sex offence convictions
